name: Sykes Smith
story: Dylan Lewis grew up in Cape Town, South Africa where he developed a passion for soccer and later the military. He joined the South African Defense Force at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills and marksmanship abilities. When the opportunity presented itself to join NATO's Operation Harvest Red in the Altis region, he eagerly accepted and was assigned to the British Armed Forces as a grenadier. Dylan is always looking for ways to improve himself and his team, and he takes his role as a protector of his country and allies very seriously.
